sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"增加，增大"或"扩大"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: enlarge, amplify, expand, increase, magnify, multiply, augment
means: enlarge ： 主要指面积或体积等的扩大。
amplify ： 在科技中常指声音的扩大或电磁波的增强。也指补充了细节、详述或扩大内容等。此词系正式用语。
expand ： 指范围、程度、体积和尺寸等方面的扩大或增加。
increase ： 指数量、强度和大小等方面的扩大或增加。
magnify ： 可指用光学仪器使物体看上去显得变大；也指事实上把某物增大，有时用于夸张意味。
multiply ： 通常指自然繁殖而产生的增长，有时也指同类事物数量的成倍增加。
augment ： 较正式用词，一般指在原有的基础上增加含量而扩大。

sentence.Network_en: Workmen were hired to remodel and enlarge the farm buildings.
sentence.Network_cn: 雇用了工人来改造和扩建农场建筑。

sentence.Network_en: Different states or groups can combine to enlarge their markets.
sentence.Network_cn: 不同的州或企业集团可以联合起来以扩大市场。

sentence.Network_en: I wish to enlarge upon a statement made by Gary Docking.
sentence.Network_cn: 我想就加里·多金的话再展开说一下。

PETS3_资料内容_资料下载_学习资料共享网 ... enjoyment 享乐，乐趣，欣赏，愉快 enlarge 扩大，放大，增大 enormous 巨大的， …

jx.jx_en_mean: speak or write about (something) in greater detail

lj.lj_ly: I would like to enlarge on this theme.
lj.lj_ls: 我想就这一主题进行详述。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (formerly also as inlarge): from Old French enlarger, from en- (expressing a change of state) + large 'large'

entry.def: When you enlarge something or when it enlarges, it becomes bigger.

example.ex: ...the plan to enlarge Ewood Park into a 30,000 all-seater stadium...
example.tran: 将伊伍德公园球场扩建成能容纳3万座席的体育场的计划

example.ex: The glands in the neck may enlarge.

entry.def: To enlarge a photograph means to develop a bigger print of it.

example.ex: ...newlyweds wishing to enlarge snaps of their big day.
example.tran: 希望把他们大喜之日的照片放大的新婚夫妻

entry.tran: 进一步补充;详述;详细说明
entry.def: If you enlarge on something that has been mentioned, you give more details about it.

example.ex: He didn't enlarge on the form that the interim government and assembly would take...
example.tran: 他没有进一步说明过渡政府和立法机构将采取的形式。

example.ex: I wish to enlarge upon a statement made by Gary Docking.
example.tran: 我想就加里·多金的话再展开说一下。

means.word_mean: 4. add details, as to an account or idea; clarify the meaning of and discourse in a learned way, usually in writing;

sentences.sentence: "She elaborated on the main ideas in her dissertation"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 动词前缀,通常加在名词前构成动词,表示"进入……之中,包围,成为"; 2. 动词前缀,表示"使……进入状态或加强等意思"

stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+dem人民+ic表形容词→在人民之中→地方性的
en进入……之中,包围,成为+cage笼子→v.关入笼中
en进入……之中,包围,成为+chain锁链→v.束缚
en进入……之中,包围,成为+roll转,倦→往里倦→注册

stems_affixes.value_cn: 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
stems_affixes.word_buile: en进入……之中,包围,成为+title标题,头衔→v. 给……题名, 给……称号;授权, 授权
en进入……之中,包围,成为+trap陷阱→v.以网或陷阱捕捉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+purple紫→v.使成紫色 v.发紫
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+act行动→进入行动→颁布[法令]
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+chant反复说;咒语→被咒语所迷醉
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+courage勇气→使人进入勇气→鼓励
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+danger危险→v.使危险
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+franchise特权,公民权→给予选举权

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使忙碌, 雇佣, 预定
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+gage挑战→进入挑战→忙碌于……
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+large大→v.扩大, 放大
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+light光+en变成→给人光明→启发
en使……进入状态或加强等意思+list名单→进入名单→入伍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+rich富的→v.使富足, 使肥沃, 装饰, 加料于, 浓缩

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……进入状态或加强等意思+wrap包裹→v.包裹, 围绕, 包围;使专注

Sentence.sentence: But because you can't drive a car and watch television at the same time, rush hour became radio's prime, while music, talk, and news radio greatly enlarged their audiences.

means.word_mean: 扩大, 扩展, 扩充

sentences.en: The balloon enlarged as we pumped air into it.
sentences.cn: 那个气球充气后就变大了。

sentences.en: This photograph won't probably enlarge well.
sentences.cn: 这张照片放大出来很可能效果不好。

sentences.en: This photograph is too small, please enlarge it for me.
sentences.cn: 这张照片太小, 请把它给我放大。
